text: Cun ʙaroi giriftani ƣanimatho ʙa roh ʙijafted, onon, ki az cang taxalluf (qafokasi) namudaand, xohand guft: «Bigzored, to mo ham az pai sumo ʙijoem! Mexohand suxani Xudoro digargun kunand. Bigu: '«Sumo hargiz az pai mo naxohed omad. Xudo az pes cunin guftaast». Sipas xohand guft: «Balki ʙar mo hasad meʙared?» Na, inho cuz andake namefahmand
